tclibrary.name: VTML 标签
tclibrary.desc: 用于自定义此应用程序的 VTML 可视化工具标记语言标签的集合。

category.name: 标签编辑器和常规标签
category.desc: Tags that display a tag editor and display tag attributes.

tclibrary.category:

category.name: 标签检查器标签
category.desc: Tags that display tag attributes and categories in Tag Inspector and Tag Insight.

tclibrary.category: <element name="ATTRIB" value='' reference='VTML,Attrib'/> <element name="ATTRIBCATEGORIES" value='' reference='VTML,Attribcategories'/> <element name="ATTRIBGROUP" value='' reference='VTML,Attribgroup'/> <element name="ATTRIBOPTION" value='' reference='VTML,Attriboption'/> <element name="EVENT" value='' reference='VTML,Event'/>

category.name: 向导标签
category.desc: Tags that display a Wizard and its pages with user input controls.

tclibrary.category: <element name="INPUT (VTML 2)" value='' reference='VTML,Input'/> <element name="NEXTPAGE" value='' reference='VTML,Nextpage'/> <element name="PAGE" value='' reference='VTML,Page'/> <element name="PARAM (VTML 2)" value='' reference='VTML,Param'/> <element name="PARAM for WIZARD" value='' reference='VTML,Param'/> <element name="PARAM for PAGE" value='' reference='VTML,Param'/> <element name="TEMPLATE" value='' reference='VTML,Template'/> <element name="WIZARD" value='' reference='VTML,Wizard'/> <element name="" value='' reference='VTML,Pagelayout'/>

category.name: WIZML 标签
category.desc: Tags that process user input to construct a tag in your document.

tclibrary.category: <element name="WIZINCLUDE" value='' reference='VTML,Wizinclude'/> <element name="WIZLOOP" value='' reference='VTML,Wizloop'/> <element name="WIZLOOP Index" value='' reference='VTML,Wizloop'/> <element name="WIZLOOP Condition" value='' reference='VTML,Wizloop'/> <element name="WIZLOOP List" value='' reference='VTML,Wizloop'/> <element name="WIZIF" value='' reference='VTML,Wizif'/> <element name="WIZELSEIF" value='' reference='VTML,Wizif'/> <element name="" value='' reference='VTML,Wizloop'/> <element name="" value='' reference='VTML,Wizloop'/> <element name="" value='' reference='VTML,Wizif'/>

category.name: Exp.Builder 和标签选择器
category.desc: Tags to define Tag Chooser and Expression Builder definition files.
